title: Latest updates: East Midlands Live Monday 19 March - BBC News
summary: man convicted of raping and murdering 72-year-old jane hings .
derbyshire schools targeted in bomb hoax .
man jailed after attack on girl , 12 , caught on camera .
thousands visit moon in leicester cathedral .
italy opens investigation into death of mariam moustafa .
vigil to be held for student who died after assault .
man charged over attempted rape of girl .
leicester city knocked out of fa cup .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: dedicated live coverage for this region has now ended for monday , but some news , sport and travel updates will continue to appear overnight .
east midlands live will return from 08:00 tomorrow morning .

documents.title: lane closure causing delays on m1
text: this might slow you up a bit on your way home this evening .
# m1 northbound within j24 there is currently 1 lane closed .
we have traffic officers on scene .
there are minor delays in the area .
please take care on approach .
thank you
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: watch : murderer in pub before attack on elderly woman
text: craig keogh was high on cocaine when he raped and murdered a 72-year-old woman at her bungalow in fleckney .
on the night of 23 september the 26-year-old had been on a night out - this cctv footage shows him at the black dog pub in oadby .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: sex offender caught by 'paedo hunters '
text: sex offender caught by 'paedo hunters '

documents.title: bodycam footage of keogh murder arrest
text: in the early hours of sunday 24 september keogh went to ms hings home where she was asleep in bed .
it 's believed he attacked her before smothering her with a pillow and stealing her jewellery .
ms hings was found dead in her bed at 07:00 the following morning by two of her carers .
two days later keogh was arrested at a caravan on saddington road in fleckney .
today he was convicted of her rape and murder .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: crack down on 'defective ' taxis
text: the police and county council have been conducting checks on the condition of taxis in derbyshire .
police have said all vehicles checked were found defective .
this private hire vehicle had water in the boot and electrical wiring not properly insulated .
this vehicle was damaged in a crash that was n't reported to the council .
the light unit brackets were broken and there was coolant leaking .
both of these drivers had their licence suspended and were issued with a prohibition notice .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: breakingman convicted of raping and murdering 72-year-old woman
text: a 26-year old man has been found guilty of the rape and murder of an elderly woman from fleckney .
craig keogh claimed 72-year-old jane hings paid him £ 200 for sex .
she was found dead at her bungalow on elizabeth road on 24 september 2017 .
he was convicted today of murder , two counts of rape and one count of burglary .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: 'paedo hunter ' sex offender found hanged in prison cell
text: an inquest jury 's been hearing how a child sex offender was found hanged in his cell at nottingham prison .
ricky slade , 30 , of no fixed address , had been arrested after a self-styled `` paedophile hunting '' group filmed a confrontation with him .
slade thought he had been grooming children under 16 for sexual purposes when in fact he had been communicating with members of the group .
the assistant coroner , ivan cartwright , said such confrontation clips could `` obtain viral status '' .
but community nurse jonathan berry , who assessed slade , said he seemed `` unaware of how these groups worked '' .
he described slade as `` very guarded '' making it `` difficult to assess his anxieties '' .

last year , slade was sent to prison after failing to turn up for sentencing for three counts of attempting to incite a child under 13 to engage in sexual activity and one count of attempting to meet a child under 16 following grooming .
the guard who took him , simon mather , told the inquest `` the colour drained from slade 's face '' and that he looked `` scared and frightened '' and was `` deeply upset and started crying '' .
he was classed as a vulnerable prisoner because of his offences and put in a cell on delta wing .
eight days later on 3 february he was found hanged in his cell .
author: Jo Healey
East Midlands Today

documents.title: 'paedo hunter ' sex offender died in jail
text: 'paedo hunter ' sex offender died in jail

documents.title: body in burnt out car 'not sus
text: the death of a man found in a burnt out car in hinckley is being treated by police as `` not sus
a member of the public discovered the car on monday 5 march at burbage common .
police said `` extensive inquiries '' have been carried out into the circumstances surrounding the death and have found it not to be sus
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: burglar ate cheese from couple 's fridge
text: a crook smashed his way into a derbyshire home and took bites out of cheese from the fridge , helped himself to cava and moved their socks around .
author: Derby Telegraph

documents.title: millions tune into foxes ' fa cup match
text: millions of eyes were on leicester yesterday just a shame about the result .
sunday 's fa cup tie between leicester and chelsea got a peak audience of 7.8m on bbc one .
thanks for watching !
# bbcfacup
is that a case of `` so good we tweeted it twice '' ?
it 's a case of 'we made a mistake the first time so here is the corrected version '
what was the difference .
looked identical to me
the first one said saturday .
they were waiting for the news
feel sorry for them all having to watch that shitshow
7.8 million bored tv watchers then ?
# tvlicence # bbc # asleep
now there is something to talk about regarding this game just wish i 'd known sunday 's program was on catchup from saturday and could have missed it twice
i watched it on saturday .
only cause there was fuck all else on .
should be a booking for ungentlemanly conduct .
kicking the flag .
here 's the tweet bbc sport deleted very quickly
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: renewed appeal for missing beeston woman
text: officers have released a new photo as part of a renewed appeal for missing sarah wright .
sarah was reported missing from beeston on 15 march having last been seen at about 12:00 .
she is also known as sarah kearsley and was last seen wearing a dark brown leather jacket , green top , black trousers and black boots .
nottinghamshire police said they had a `` dedicated team of volunteers and officers working 24/7 trying to find her '' .
the team has also carried out searches in the river trent and around beeston marina .
a statement issued by sarah 's family said : `` if you see this appeal please know that we are here to support you .
`` we just want you home safe .
we are not angry , we want to help .
sarah , we love you please come home . ''
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC News

documents.title: girl thanks public for generosity after attack
text: a 12-year-old girl who had her phone stolen in an attack caught on cctv , has said she has been `` blown away '' by the generosity of people .
nearly £ 2,000 in donations was raised for the child after the footage showing her struggling with patrik gunar was published online .
the girl said this means she can replace her phone along with the clothes she was wearing at the time .
she said : `` the public reaction really raised my self-confidence after i initially felt very low following the incident . ''
the girls mother has said the support and generosity shown to her daughter has been `` amazing '' .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: man jailed for cctv phone attack on girl
text: man jailed for cctv phone attack on girl

documents.title: police concern mounts for missing girls
text: police in kirklees have renewed their appeal to find two missing girls from batley who have not been seen for almost two weeks .
officers say bernadett berki,12 ( let ) , and szimonetta berki , 11 ( centre ) , could be with their three-year-old niece , leonetta bogdan ( right ) .
west yorkshire police say that they have links and extended family across huddersfield , the leicester area and the hungarian community .
according to detectives , no other `` third party '' is involved .
if you see them , contact police on 101 .
we are becoming increasingly concerned for their welfare as we have been unable to find them and are now calling on members of the public to come forward and help us ''

documents.title: university 'sleep out ' for homeless awareness
text: staff and students from the university of leicester will be spending a night sleeping rough to raise awareness of homelessness .
later this month volunteers will sleep outside the fielding johnson building with only cardboard , a sleeping bag , flasks and their clothes to keep warm .
it 's hoped some money can also be raised - it will be donated to the bridge homeless charity in leicester .

addressing the issue of homelessness is vital , particularly at this time of year when conditions deteriorate for rough sleepers , and fundraising efforts such as this are so important in helping us to address these challenges and support the city 's homeless community . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: still no cause of death for six-year-old
text: still no cause of death for six-year-old

documents.title: man jailed for derby girl street attack
text: a man who snatched a 12-year-old girl 's phone in an attack captured on cctv has been jailed for three years .
the judge said patrik gunar will serve half of this sentence and be out on licence for the remainder of the time .
the 22-year-old turned on the girl in cambridge street , derby , on 18 february , forcing her to the pavement .
after a struggle , which went on for 25 seconds , he pulled the phone from her hand and ran off .
he pleaded guilty to robbery during a hearing at derby crown court .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: teens bailed over loughborough stabbing
text: three teenage boys arrested after a man was stabbed in loughborough last week have been released on police bail .
the attack happened on magnolia avenue on wednesday night when the victim says he confronted a group of youths who were slashing the tyres of his car .
the man was taken to hospital and was discharged over the weekend .
in total , six teenagers have been arrested in connection with the attack .
author: BBC Radio Leicester

documents.title: motorcyclist dies after crash
text: a motorcyclist has died following a collision involving a car in cuckney .
nottinghamshire police said a vw passat and a yamaha motorcycle were involved in the crash on the a616 .
the motorcyclist was pronounced dead at the scene and the driver of the car was taken to the queen 's medical centre with minor injuries .
it happened at about 16:00 on thursday .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC News

documents.title: council review £ 5m loan to neighbouring authority
text: the leader of leicestershire county council has reassured taxpayers it will get its £ 5m loan back from northamptonshire county council .
the authority lent its neighbours the money but now northamptonshire county council is facing allegations of financial mismanagement .
a report last week recommended it should be abolished and replaced with two unitary authorities .
so what does this mean for the money leicestershire lent them ?
well , byron rhodes has told the bbc : `` i appreciate that there is some disquiet and we 've taken action to carefully review the loan .
`` our professional view is that despite northamptonshire county council 's situation , there is no realistic prospect of the loan not being paid back . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: moon exhibition attracts thousands of visitors
text: more than 26,000 people visited the museum of the moon exhibition at leicester cathedral over the last 10 days .
that 's roughly 6,000 more than the amount of people that queued to see the coffin of richard iii when it went on display for three days in march 2015 .
yesterday was the last day the seven meter replica moon was on show - people were queuing around the block to see it .
the exhibition is on a worldwide tour .
its visit to leicester was for british science week .
next stop - australia for the gold coast 2018 commonwealth games .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: lamb named after football manager
text: wool you accept this as an apology ?
one of the latest arrivals in egginton has been named after cardiff city manager neil warnock .
the name was chosen as an apology after the match with derby county was called off at the weekend because areas surrounding the stadium were considered unsafe .
here are some other new arrivals at the farm which is now in full lambing season and working round the clock to help the sheep give birth .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC News

documents.title: m69 delays because of broken down car
text: two lanes are closed on the m69 in leicestershire because of a broken down car .
highways england say delays are building up .
lane 2 closed # m69 # leicestershire northbound between j2 # hinckley and # m1 due to a broken down car just prior to # m1 rbt .
@ twitterid are on scene and have requested recovery , there are delays of approx 15 mins on approach .
safe travels .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC News

documents.title: university to open new environment centre
text: work has started on a new environment centre at nottingham trent university .
the centre , which will be adjoined with a new reception area , will be used for teaching , learning and research into global challenges around the environment , ecology and conservation .
it will be part of the university 's brackenhurst campus , which is home to the school of animal , rural and environmental sciences .
the new building will include a cafe and dining area , a 200-seat lecture theatre , staff offices and teaching and research rooms .
there will also be a mezzanine , a roof garden and external spaces for staff and students .
the building is due to open in september 2019 .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC News

documents.title: snow closes derbyshire roads
text: the snow and ice is still affecting some roads in north-west derbyshire .
police have advised drivers in the glossop and buxton areas to only travel if necessary .

current road closures in the # highpeak area are as follows : - a6024 holme moss - a57 snake pass - monks road , chunal to charlesworth our advice to those in the north west of the county is to only travel if absolutely necessary .
are the roads around # dcfc stadium still full of snow ?
hi andrew , please contact @ twitterid for an update about the condition of the area around the stadium .
thanks i dont trust them , the game was called off yesterday , but there was no snow to be seen , i wondered if it was the same today
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC News

documents.title: man charged over attempted rape of girl
text: a 20-year-old man has been charged with the attempted rape of a girl .
it follows two reports of assaults on saturday at 9:00 and 15:00 in new balderton , newark , where two female victims suffered minor injuries , police said .

the man from long row , newark , is due before mansfield magistrates ' court today charged with attempted rape of a child under the age of 13 , assault with the intention to commit a sexual offence and possession of a bladed article .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC News

documents.title: weather watchers : your snow
text: the `` mini beast from the east '' brought a last ( we hope ) wintry blast to the country this weekend .
it might have been cold but it made for some delightful photographs , like this in tideswell in derbyshire
this cute dog in dronfield was certainly enjoying the white stuff
but there was still a touch of spring in kegworth today
and this was bestwood village
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: vigil to be held for mariam moustafa
text: a vigil is being held this evening in memory of mariam moustafa .
the 18-year-old student from nottingham died on wednesday after she was assaulted by a group of women on 20 february .
miss moustafa 's family is expected to join the vigil at the brian clough statue in nottingham from 17:30 .
a post-mortem examination into her death was inconclusive .
nottinghamshire police said more tests would take place to establish if there was a link between the assault and miss moustafa 's death .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC News

documents.title: derbyshire school closures
text: more schools have had to close in derbyshire today because of the weather :

documents.title: leicester lose to chelsea in fa cup quarter-finals
text: it was heartbreak for leicester city yesterday evening when the foxes crashed out of the fa cup after a 2-1 defeat to chelsea after extra time .
defeat came late on when pedro headed in the winner for chelsea .
speaking after the quarter-final at king power , foxes manager claude puel said : `` i 'm a bit upset at the moment because i think we deserved another result .
`` they found a good , clinical edge .
morata 's goal was the only chance of the first half , it was harsh to concede just before half-time .
but we came back with more calm and more quality . ''
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: fa must be accountable for refs - nolan
text: fa must be accountable for refs - nolan

documents.title: what is it like when an asylum centre opens next door ?
text: each year , thousands of asylum seekers are rehoused across the uk .
but in some areas residents say they are not happy with the influx or the lack of communication .
ajit atwal opposed a plan to convert a student halls of residence in derby into an initial accommodation centre for 225 asylum seekers .
`` it 's a fantastic area , very-close knit community .
one of those areas where all the neighbours are on first name terms with each other , '' he said .
hundreds of people signed a petition against the centre , but it opened and the first arrivals began moving in last month .
ajit says they have had little information from private security firm g4s , which runs the centre .
`` they should 've consulted with people and given reassurance that 'we 're here to work with you and any concerns you 've got come to us directly .
you can get on with life and the refugees here can get on with their life ' . ''

in a statement , g4s said that before the centre opened it `` held a public consultation event and gave regular statements to local newspapers who covered the planning process '' , and later attended a public meeting to update residents on its progress .
author: Sean Clare
BBC political producer

documents.title: rest will do forest good - karanka
text: rest will do forest good - karanka

documents.title: technical fault causes tram delays
text: engineers are still working on a technical fault in bulwell .
there has been no tram service between bulwell and bulwell forest for almost three hours this morning .

service update : due to a technical fault between bulwell and bulwell forest we will not be able to fully operate between these stops today please find all information required in order to successfully complete your journey on our facebook page .
when is the next tram from butlers hill ?
hi , where are you travelling to ?
qmc i know i need to change but when is the next tram here ?
it should be arriving at your stop within the next minute .
when is the next tram from qmc-hucknall
hi , should be with you in about 2 minutes
hi is the problem sorted out ?
no pete .
do you think it will be sorted before the morning
unfortunately we do not have a timeframe at the moment pete .
we are hoping to have a further update at some point this afternoon/evening .
i 'm sorry i can not be more precise .
ok thank you
hi any updates ?
hi pete , i am just about to post an update now .
please take a look on our website or facebook in a couple of minutes : )
any idea when this will be resolved ?
hi pete , our engineers are currently working on resolving the issue .
once we have further information we will update our web pages .
thank you
hi maryam , our engineers are currently working on the fault .
we will update our web pages when we have further information .
the information you 've given is very confusing and conflicting .
i 'm going to be traveling from basford into the city , how can i do this ?
hi liam , you will be able to travel as normal .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC News

BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: bus stop duck becomes face of greeting card
text: remember the duck which was ruffling feathers in arnold earlier this year ?
the black and white muscovy duck , normally native to mexico and south america , became a social media sensation after she kept turning up at a bus stop on mansfield road .
she is now the face of a greeting card .
mark blake is the wildlife photographer who took her for the card .
he said : `` there was snow on the ground so the reflection was really good and i am mad on light , so i took quite a few shots of her . ''
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC News

documents.title: latest school closures for nottinghamshire
text: although the snow is clearing , three schools are closed in nottinghamshire .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC News

documents.title: mariam moustafa death : rome prosecutor opens investigation
text: prosecutors in rome have opened an investigation into the death of an 18-year-old student in nottingham .
mariam moustafa , an egyptian national who was born in rome , died on wednesday after she was assaulted by a group of women on 20 february .
the rome prosecutor has asked the uk authorities to share details of the investigation , italian media reported .
the italian foreign ministry said the ambassador to the uk was closely following the investigation .
a post-mortem examination into miss moustafa 's death was inconclusive .
uk police said more tests would take place to establish if there was a link between the assault and her death .
author: Samantha Fisher
BBC News Online

documents.title: join us for our live coverage
text: good morning nottinghamshire , derbyshire and leicestershire .
amy woodfield and i will be writing the updates on today 's live page with all the latest news , sport , weather and travel .
if you 'd like to get in touch with us , you can send an email , or use facebook or twitter .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC News
